title: Navigate forwards to a partially checked checkbox in reading mode
task: navigate forwards to partially checked checkbox
setupScriptDescription: sets focus on a link before the first checkbox
instructions: Navigate to the first checkbox. Note: it should be in the partially checked state. You may need to press certain commands (such as Down Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the checkbox.
assertion3: State of the checkbox (partially checked) is conveyed
